name: Calamity: World Rewritten
core: The current structure suggests it may not survive intact; the reading points toward a change large enough to reorder the field itself.
shadow: Upheaval becomes ruin when collapse is treated as cleansing for its own sake.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates rebuilding can begin only after the break is faced directly.
umbralNote: Its umbral note strongly supports caution, shelter, and acceptance that the old arrangement is ending.

name: Calamity: Falling Red Moon
core: A spectacular disruption suggests that what seemed distant is now descending into immediate consequence.
shadow: Catastrophe becomes fixation when spectacle distracts from the necessary response.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward urgent adaptation under extreme pressure.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing exposure and preserving what can still be saved.

name: Calamity: Sundered Sky
core: A broken firmament suggests the scale of the crisis exceeds ordinary shelter and demands a larger reckoning.
shadow: Magnitude becomes paralysis when the immensity of the damage is used as a reason not to act at all.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward immediate reprioritization under altered conditions.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving what remains viable while the larger rupture continues to unfold.

name: Calamity: Blackened Tide
core: A poisoned flood suggests the destructive force is spreading through what once carried life and continuity.
shadow: Corruption becomes inevitability when contamination is accepted as the new order without resistance.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates decisive containment is still meaningful even in the midst of loss.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests withdrawal from the tainted current until the scope of damage is known.

name: Calamity: City of Ash
core: A ruined habitation suggests that systems once relied upon may now exist only as warning and residue.
shadow: Loss becomes identity when ruin is treated as the only possible future after devastation.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward learning from the remains without lingering in them.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests grieving the destruction before asking what can be rebuilt.

name: Calamity: Broken Throne
core: A shattered seat of rule suggests legitimacy has failed before order has been restored.
shadow: Collapse becomes opportunism when the fall of authority is treated only as an opening for appetite.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward rebuilding governance from what still has standing.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests resisting any rush to crown a replacement before the fracture is understood.

name: Calamity: Hollow Sun
core: An emptied brilliance suggests the source of guidance or vitality may still shine while failing to sustain what depends upon it.
shadow: Radiance becomes fraud when appearance of strength masks inward exhaustion.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward identifying what still truly nourishes and what only imitates it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing dependence on the failing center before it gives out entirely.

name: Calamity: Cinder Rain
core: A slow-falling ruin suggests the destructive event is ongoing and arriving in waves rather than one clean strike.
shadow: Persistence becomes terror when each new sign is treated as proof that no response is possible.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward maintaining response over duration rather than expecting one decisive correction.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests sheltering between impacts and conserving strength for the long strain.

name: Calamity: Emptied Sea
core: A vanished body suggests the expected support, resource, or emotional depth has been stripped away beyond ordinary loss.
shadow: Absence becomes doom when emptiness is mistaken for finality rather than altered condition.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward acting from the truth of scarcity rather than the memory of abundance.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests not spending what no longer exists in the old measure.

name: Calamity: Iron Night
core: A long and metallic darkness suggests the crisis is becoming systemic, impersonal, and difficult to soften through ordinary mercy.
shadow: Endurance becomes normalization when the machinery of the harm is accepted as permanent.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward identifying the rigid structure within the disaster before confronting it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing direct exposure while the system remains unbroken.

name: Calamity: Sevenfold Wound
core: Layered injury suggests the present crisis is not singular but compounded across several linked domains.
shadow: Complexity becomes despair when the many wounds are used to deny the value of treating any one of them.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward triage and sequencing under conditions of serious damage.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests resisting any solution that pretends the harm is simple.

name: Calamity: Void Harvest
core: Predatory taking suggests the crisis is feeding upon the very efforts made to withstand it.
shadow: Devouring force becomes nihilism when sacrifice is treated as proof that nothing should be defended.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward cutting off the source of the harvest before committing further resources.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests withholding fuel from what grows stronger through your response.

name: Calamity: Frozen Dawn
core: A dawn that cannot fully arrive suggests renewal is being delayed at the threshold by conditions not yet resolved.
shadow: Delay becomes surrender when the withheld dawn is treated as proof that change will never come.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward preparing for renewal even before the full light returns.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests conserving hope and resources while the freeze still holds.

name: Calamity: Last Fall
core: A terminal descent suggests a cycle is reaching its irreversible drop and should be recognized as such.
shadow: Finality becomes melodrama when the fall is narrated as absolute before the ground is actually reached.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward choosing carefully what must survive the descent.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests accepting the end of the old height instead of wasting strength preserving it.
